description:
Say hello to your new lightweight button down. One that you can dress up or down, and that features a subtle pattern that won't dominate your look but adds just the right amount of detail.

100% organic, the prAna Mountain Drift Long Sleeve Shirt for men feels gentle on your skin, while treading gently on the planet. It comes in two fits too, so take your pick of standard or slim.
name: Prana Mountain Drift LS - Standard - Mens
